  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.contento.se:13641</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CFL</catalog>
            <entry>13641</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Syror och baser</string>
            <string language="en">Acids and bases</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Säuren und Unterseiten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Acides et bases</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ácidos e bases</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Acidi e basi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οξέα και βάσεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ácidos y bases</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Behandlar begreppen stark och svag syra och stark och svag bas. Protolyserna visas med animationer. Vattnets autoprotolys visas. Sura och basiska lösningar diskuteras.Ingår i Modul 4 - Kemi A.</string>
            <string language="en">Treats the concepts strong and weak acid and strong and weak basis. Protolyserna is shown with animationer. The water's autoprotolys is shown. Sour and basic solutions are discussed.

Is included in module 4 - chemistry A.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">syra</string>
            <string language="sv">bas</string>
            <string language="sv">protolys</string>
            <string language="sv">oxoniumjon</string>
            <string language="sv">hydroxidjon</string>
            <string language="sv">autoprotolys</string>
            <string language="sv">Kemi A</string>
            <string language="sv">kemi</string>
            <string language="en">acid</string>
            <string language="en">basis</string>
            <string language="en">protolys</string>
            <string language="en">oxoniumjon</string>
            <string language="en">hydroxidjon</string>
            <string language="en">autoprotolys</string>
            <string language="en">Chemistry A</string>
            <string language="en">chemistry</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Behandelt die starken Konzepte und schwache Säure 
und starke und schwache Grundlage. Protolyserna wird mit 
animationer gezeigt. Die autoprotolys des Wassers wird gezeigt. 
Saure und basische Lösungen sind discussed.Is, die in Modul 4 -
Chemie A eingeschlossen sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Traite les concepts forts et acide faible et base 
forte et faible. Protolyserna est montré avec l'animationer. 
Les autoprotolys de l'eau est montrés. Les solutions 
aigres et basiques sont discussed.Is inclus dans le module 4 - la 
chimie A.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Trata os conceitos fortes e ácido fraco e base 
forte e fraca. Protolyserna é mostrado com animationer. 
Os autoprotolys da água são mostrados. As soluções 
sour e básicas são discussed.Is incluídos no módulo 4 - o 
chemistry A.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tratta i concetti forti ed acido debole e base 
forte e debole. Protolyserna è indicato con animationer. 
I autoprotolys dell'acqua è indicato. Le soluzioni acide 
e basiche sono discussed.Is inclusi in modulo 4 - chimica A.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μεταχειρίζεται την ισχυρή και αδύνατη όξινη και 
ισχυρή και αδύνατη βάση εννοιών. Το Protolyserna 
εμφανίζεται με το animationer. Το ύδωρ autoprotolys 
εμφανίζεται. Οι ξινές και βασικές λύσεις συζητούνται 
συμπεριλαμβάνονται στην ενότητα 4 - χημεία Α.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Trata los conceptos fuertes y ácido débil y base 
fuerte y débil. Protolyserna se muestra con el animationer. 
Se muestran los autoprotolys del agua. Las soluciones 
amargas y básicas son discussed.Is incluidos en el módulo 4 - la 
química A.</string>
          </description>
